revision.text:
<!--회사_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Company
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영문 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 형태 | ontologyProperty = type }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 창립 | ontologyProperty = formationDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 창립 | ontologyProperty = formationYear }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 창립자 | ontologyProperty = foundedBy }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 해체 | ontologyProperty = extinctionDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 해체 | ontologyProperty = extinctionYear }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이전 회사 | ontologyProperty = predecessor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이후 회사 | ontologyProperty = successor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국가 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 장소 | ontologyProperty = location }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 사업 지역 | ontologyProperty = regionServed }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 인물 | ontologyProperty = keyPerson }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 산업 | ontologyProperty = industry }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 서비스 | ontologyProperty = service }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 대표 제품 | ontologyProperty = product }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}

	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종업원 | ontologyProperty = numberOfEmployees }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 모기업 | ontologyProperty = parentCompany }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 주요 자회사 | ontologyProperty = subsidiary }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영업이익 | ontologyProperty = operatingIncome | unit = Currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 순이익 | ontologyProperty = netIncome | unit = Currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 총자산 | ontologyProperty = assets | unit = Currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 매출액 | ontologyProperty = revenue | unit = Currency }}
end}}
<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 시장 정보 = 
| 상장일 =
| 자본금 = 
| 주주 = 
-->
